connector.description: Receive Messages from Azure Storage queues.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.description: The Azure Storage Queue account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.queueName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.description: The Azure Storage Queue container name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.description: The Azure Storage Queue access Key.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.maxMessages
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-queue-source.description: Maximum number of messages to get, if there are less messages exist in the queue than requested all the messages will be returned. By default it will consider 1 message to be retrieved, the allowed range is 1 to 32 messages.
